About Me

Currently pursuing Information Systems Management at Carnegie Mellon University. With a demonstrated experience in retail and service industry for about 5 years, I have explored and learnt many technologies, starting from salesforce administration, salesforce customisation using Apex and Java, learning and developing excel VBA macros, moving to web development where I learnt JavaScript and related UI technologies (React, NodeJS) and managing teams and deliverables.

I am passionate about coding and am skilled in software development lifecycle, from managing teams, collaborating with Product Managers for user design and experience, to building and delivering quality products through Agile and Waterfall methodologies. I am looking forward to continue my journey in technology by combining my experience and the skills I am currently gaining from Carnegie Mellon University to provide best, out of the box solutions to the organisations I will be associating with.

What I do?

Courses

Java, Distributed Systems, Web App Development, SQL and NoSQL Database Management, Artificial Intelligence



Languages

Java, Python, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, SQL, VBA





Web Technologies

HTML5/CSS/JS, Django, Java Servlets, JSP, React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Apex, Bootstrap, Materialize

Databases

Oracle Database SQLPLUS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Couchbase, Redis, Cassandra, Neo4j

Cloud

Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Heroku





Business Analysis

Requirement Gathering, Product Planning and Management, Solution Design, Troubleshooting



Tools/Frameworks

Android, Git, Django channels, Apache Tomcat, WebSockets, d3 charts, Azure DevOps for CI/CD, Redux, Flux, Gulp, Grunt, Webpack, Jenkins, Unit test frameworks (Django tests, Jest, Enzyme, Mocha, Chai, Istanbul), Microsoft Excel, Jitterbit, Apex Data Loader, Putty, Postman, Selenium

Education

Carnegie Mellon University

Master of Information Systems Management

PES Institute of Technology, Visvesvaraya Technical University

Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical Engineering
